summary: Create comprehensive demo video plan with realistic multi-agent scenario
context: User wants a demo video showcasing all Twining capabilities. We have existing dashboard screenshots and a complete v1.3 implementation (28 MCP tools, web dashboard, agent coordination, verification). Need to demonstrate practical value through a realistic scenario.
rationale: Demo should follow a narrative arc showing how agents use Twining throughout a realistic development workflow. Better to show the "why" (solving real coordination problems) rather than just feature enumeration. Will use a multi-agent scenario where agents coordinate on adding authentication to a web app, demonstrating blackboard, decisions, knowledge graph, context assembly, verification, and handoffs.

alternatives.reason_rejected: Less compelling than showing features in context of solving real problems
Video format better for showcasing asynchronous agent interactions and dashboard visualizations
